name: VEDAR - Simplest way to make optimal design decisions
description:
Use VEDAR to make quick, optimal design decisions, scaled from quick wins to large roadmap initiatives. Order items by priority according to value, effort & dependencies. The Design Decision Chart turns features into a stack ranked TO DO list for you. Always do the most impactful work first.


Updated Jul 31,2021. Comments and feedback greatly appreciated to author, Bill Stewart.
